channel.title: Teleport Delay

item.title: Teleport Delay
item.dc:creator: @billbo1280 billbo1280
item.description:
@billbo1280 wrote:

i want to make my teleporting more like rs and im almost done with it but i need to make a small delay between the emote and the gfx happing if someone could post some code to do that i be very happy thank

here my code

public void teleport()
{
teleport = true;
if(ancientstele == true)
{
stillgfx(392, absY, absX);
addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[6]), 6);
teletimer = 9;
}
else if(ancientstele == false)
{
setAnimation(714);
//need delay here//
staticAnimation(111, absX, absY, 100);
addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[6]), 6);
teletimer = 6;
}
}

i tryed but this but diddnt work

newAnimDelay = 6;

Read full topic
